title: Defense Tips
author: A Lone Skeleton
pages: Foolish human, protect yourself! Walls of stone or wood may keep our arrows at bay.
Light wards against us. Place torches generously to ward my presence at dusk.
If launching arrows back is your style, remember thorns can spare you in a pinch.
Dogs may bark, but be wary of their keen detection; they can sniff out my kind.
